problem.markdown: 1. The Assaman psychrometer provide the information for the following parameters ( ) Air density, Wet bulb temp. (x) Humidity, Density ( ) Wet bulb temp., Dry bulb temp. ( ) Air pressure, Dry bulb temp. 2. To estimate psychrometry properties of Air, this following three parameters are essential: (x) Wet bulb temp, Dry bulb temp., Barometric pressure ( ) Wet bulb temp, Barometric pressure, Air density ( ) Air density, Air pressure, Humidity ( ) Air density, Humidity, Temperature 3. The least Count of Assaman Psychrometry is ( ) 0.8 ( ) 0.2 ( ) 1.0 (x) 0.4
problem.p: 1. The Assaman psychrometer provide the information for the following parameters

choicegroup.choice: Wet bulb temp., Dry bulb temp.
